item.description:
The plot: Babydoll has been sent to a mental hospital against her will. With the help of Sweet Pea, Blondie, Rocket, Amber, and a wise old mentor (Scott Glenn), she tries to escape through a fantasy world of dragons, machine guns, airplanes, and ninja swords.

The movie starts at 7 PM. Let's meet in the lobby at 6:30 PM. You can get tickets at the box office or online at http://www.jordans.com/Imax.aspx. Make sure you select the Natick theater.

Anyone who wants to can join me for food and drink after the movie. There are plenty of good places near Shopper's World. Call my cell phone if you need to reach me: 508-981-0455.

 

- David
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing my Superman cap
item.why: Sucker Punch looks like a fun, visual treat. The kind of movie best seen in IMAX.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Sucker Punch in IMAX
